import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'], }) export class AboutComponent { name = [ 'S', 'h', 'r', 'a', 'd', 'd', 'h', 'a', '_', 'B', 'i', 'j', 'o', 't', 'k', 'a', 'r', ]; }
Hello! My name is

Shraddha Bijotkar.

About me

Passionate Angular developer with 2 years of experience in crafting user interfaces that leave a lasting impression. With a strong focus on code quality and attention to detail, I specialize in building scalable and performant web applications using Angular framework.

Some of the technologies that I have worked on include (but are not limited to):
